_88cidr.description: a single block of IP addresses in CIDR format (e.g. 102.33.52.0/255). Apps may assume that anyone browsing from these addresses would be given the role 'internal' were they to authenticate as principal type of candidate, i.e. this is within a corporate network

$eref.description: a single block of IP addresses in CIDR format (e.g. 102.33.52.0/255). Apps may assume that anyone browsing from these addresses would be given the role 'internal' were they to authenticate as principal type of candidate, i.e. this is within a corporate network

___type.description: The type of tenant, i.e. sandbox or not. Apps may behave differently when installed in a sandbox, e.g. not send email.

___shortCode.description: a short, lower case identifier for the tenant, e.g. acme

___contactEmail.description: contact address for the person in charge of this tenant

___country.description: tenant's default country, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 form

___privacyPolicyUrl.description: url for the tenant's privacy policy

___timeZone.description: the default timezone for the tenant's principals, as per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tz_database
